  This based on fact tale is set in East africa 1896. Two lions on a man-eating rampage have shut down the construction of a railway. Big-game hunter Remington (Michael Douglas) and construction engineer Patterson (Val Kilmer) set out to stop these unstoppable monsters. But in this astonishing tale of man vs. Beast the hunters become the hunted.

  Starring: Michael Douglas, Val Kilmer, Tom Wilkinson, John Kani, Bernard Hill.

  Directed by: Stephen Hopkins.
